ENS is looking for DevRel talent. Hit me up!
nader dabit (ğŸ§±, ğŸš€) | sha.eth | nader.sol:â€‚How to get hired in DevRel in web3
1. Find a protocol / team in need of DevRel
2. Learn tech then create a good example codebase with high quality learning material around it - workshop, tutorial, video
3. Apply for a grant, get paid for your work regardless
4. Share it
5. Apply
